Name: RED OPS ARCADE
About the game: Red Ops Arcade is a survival and fighting game that takes place across different worlds. The player has to fight zombies, monsters, ghosts and many other enemies, using different weapons that he will find in mystery boxes. The player must reach the highest round possible, but be careful because as higher is the level, more difficult will be to finish it . Fight wave after wave to get score and diamonds! *4 Maps to play on (More are being designed) *Buy new weapons *Skins *25 + Weapons available *Tons of weapons *All Perk a Cola's from the original Black Ops Zombies *Buy Wonder weapons from the Pack-a-punch *Buy guns from the Mystery Box! *Buy keys from the Mystery Box! *Multiplayer soon available *Find some easter eggs
